Rule Description: Owner package can fully access its own data (owner=accessor)
Core_Banking_Package can read all data from all packages
Add_On_Business_Package can only read Core_Banking_Package data
Read exception between Add_On_Business_Packages is OK

Delete exception between Add_On_Business_Packages is OK
Full access exception between Add_On_Business_Packages is OK
Data that is "removed" can no longer be accessed
